entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
